SELECT ID,CONTRACT_NO,STATE,RECORD_NO,MEMBER_NAME_A,MEMBER_NAME_B,ROUND(PAY_BATCH/BATCH_COUNT*100) AS PROGRESS,TYPE,SIGNED_DATE FROM FINANCE_VIEW_2 WHERE 1=1
AND RECORD_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.recordNo},'%')
AND CONTRACT_NO LIKE CONCAT('%',#{condition.contractNo},'%')
AND TYPE =#{condition.contractType}
AND (MEMBER_NO_A=#{condition.memberNo} or MEMBER_NO_B=#{condition.memberNo})
AND SIGNED_DATE >=CONCAT(#{condition.startDate}," 00:00:00" ) AND SIGNED_DATE <= CONCAT(#{condition.endDate}," 23:59:59")
select (CASE WHEN sum(AMOUNT) is null THEN 0 ELSE sum(AMOUNT) END)AS AMOUNTITEM from M_CONTRACT_ITEM WHERE (UPDATE_STATE<>1 OR UPDATE_STATE IS NULL) AND CONTRACT_ID=#{contractNo}

SELECT (CASE WHEN sum(mcmdi.`AMOUNT`) is null THEN 0 ELSE sum(mcmdi.`AMOUNT`) END) AS AMOUNTMODIFYITEM FROM M_CONTRACT_MODIFY mcm,M_CONTRACT_MODIFY_ITEM mcmdi WHERE mcm.`ID`=mcmdi.`MODIFY_ID` AND (mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` <>1 OR mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` IS NULL) AND mcm.CONTRACT_ID=#{contractNo}
select (CASE WHEN sum(AMOUNT) is null THEN 0 ELSE sum(AMOUNT) END) AS AMOUNTBATCH from M_CONTRACT_BATCH WHERE (UPDATE_STATE<>1 OR UPDATE_STATE IS NULL) AND CONTRACT_ID=#{contractNo}

SELECT (CASE WHEN sum(mcmdi.`AMOUNT`) is null THEN 0 ELSE sum(mcmdi.`AMOUNT`) END) AS AMOUNTMODIFYBATCH FROM M_CONTRACT_MODIFY mcm,M_CONTRACT_MODIFY_BATCH mcmdi WHERE mcm.`ID`=mcmdi.`MODIFY_ID` AND (mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` <>1 OR mcmdi.`UPDATE_STATE` IS NULL) AND mcm.CONTRACT_ID = #{contractNo}
